pkgmetadata.longdescription: Macaca mulatta (Rhesus) full genome (UCSC version rheMac2) // Macaca mulatta (Rhesus) full genome as provided by UCSC (rheMac2, Jan. 2006) and stored in Biostrings objects. NOTE: In most assemblies available at UCSC, Tandem Repeats Finder repeats were filtered to retain only the repeats with period = 12. However, the filtering was omitted for this assembly, so the TRF masks contain all Tandem Repeats Finder results.
